name: snobby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like a snob (= a person who respects and likes only people who are of a high social class, or a person who has extremely high standards and is not satisfied by the things that ordinary people like): My friends who live in the city are snobby about the suburbs. There was a very snobby attitude towards exams at the school. She is snobbier than she likes to admit.
More examplesFewer examplesPeople are snobby about plastic plant pots until they see how good mine look.It may seem a bit snobby to have a specific glass for a specific wine, but it really does make a difference in how a wine tastes.The waitress who finally took our order was extremely snobby and rude.They've always been a little snobby toward him.
